verses.roman:
bhagavān api govindas
tenaivānnena gopakān
catur-vidhenāśayitvā
svayaṁ ca bubhuje prabhuḥ

synonyms: bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; api—moreover; govindaḥ—Lord Govinda; tena—with that; eva—very same; annena—food; gopakān—the cowherd boys; catuḥ-vidhena—of four varieties; aśayitvā—feeding; svayam—Himself; ca—and; bubhuje—partook; prabhuḥ—the Almighty.
translation: Govinda, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, fed the cowherd boys with that food of four varieties. Then the all-powerful Lord Himself partook of the preparations.
